name: T - Caroline
_source: speak;Emma; Mom, you never told me how beautiful sailing is{tgm}...{tgm}{w} An endless stretch of sparking blue in every direction,{w} beautiful skies with fluffy clouds,{w} and such a unique salty smell on the breeze!{w} I've never experienced anything close to this!

speak;Caroline; Don't you run away and become a pirate, now.{w} Trust me, when you're at sea for months at a time,{w} the rocking boat and endless ocean can feel maddening.{w} Not to mention that if you run into trouble,{w} there's nobody around to help or even hear you.
speak;Emma; Mom, why can't you just let me enjoy the experience?
speak;Caroline; Ah, sorry about that. Force of habit.
speak;Caroline; Anyway, when you're done messing around, get your gear ready for lookout.{w} We need someone up here to tell us whether we're heading towards land or another ship.
speak;Emma; Right{tgm}...{tgm}I'll let you know when I'm done.
speak;Caroline; Don't take all day.{w} My knees are getting tired and my eyes need a rest.
speak;Caroline; An old lady who can throw you over her shoulder.{w} Go chat with whoever you want,{w} but get your butt below deck to gear up soon.
